name: Jack of all Spades
description:
This Is a game about exploration and  platforming. Inspired by games like Stardew vally and Shanate, this game is meant to relax to while exploreing small areas.

---

The game is incompleate and it's current state is not reminisent of its final design. There are numerous things to be fixed, minor to major, including but not limited to;

The Chainsaw that is the inventory system
Saving
Item recording (Major)
Warp Door jumping
More Fitting Start Screen
Proper Scene transition
Graphics might flicer occasionaly or have lines they're not supposed to have
The "Quarry elevators" Are rather unelagant and should be improved. Yes, they are pushing you though the ground.
Some unused features may pop up here and there

Lastly, There is a fun glich that allows you to jump in midair given proper conditions, but you'll have to find it yourself if you wish to use it. Semicolin, close bracket. 

Dispite all these, the game should be functional to the point that it can be played and enjoyed

Credits go to various artists on Itch.io, Bensound.com, Opengameart.com, and Fantacy icron Megapack.
